# AVAILABLE PLANS
- Base Game (No Subscription): $29.99
- Monthly Training Plan (Subscription): $59/month
- Annual Training Plan (Subscription): $34/month

Own the ice anytime, anywhere with the most immersive off-ice hockey experience in VR with NHL Sense Arena 25!

# MAKE ANY SPACE YOUR VIRTUAL RINK
Experience the on-ice hockey experience whenever, wherever in VR as your favorite NHL team.

{540476825177635}

# BECOME AN NHL LEGEND
Level up with an all new progression system as you play across hundreds of in-game hockey scenarios, 32 NHL Season games, and take on the playoffs where you can win the Stanley Cup!

{417187431275169}

# COMPETE IN MULTIPLAYER
Challenges up to 20 other players across a variety of scenarios with all-new unlockable trophies to showcase your achievements for the ultimate bragging rights. 

{960001219008590}

The base game of NHL Sense Arena 25 includes: 
- 2024 - 25 NHL Season Mode (32 Games)
- Stanley Cup Playoffs Mode
- 3 Unique Arenas to Play In
- Competitive Multiplayer

Unlock tons of more content with our training plans designed to level up any hockey player or fan!
- Everything in the base game
- Access to over 100+ drills
- Access to Dozens of training plans from USA Hockey, pro coaches, and NHL players
- Training in-app Guidance
- 3 additional arenas to play in
